ADD_EXECUTABLE(Demo08_RagdollExample demo08.cpp OgreNewtonApplication.cpp OgreNewtonFrameListener.cpp Ragdoll.cpp ${TINYXML_SRCS})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Demo08_RagdollExample ${OGRE_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUI_LIBRARIES} ${OGRENEWT_LIBRARIES} ${OIS_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUIOGRE_LIBRARIES})

#INSTALL(TARGETS Demo08_RagdollExample RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin)
